name: Ace Cat Finder
description:
Our 3D game is about catching missing cats and while playing the protagonist Jasmin! 

When a new cat has been gone missing you can see a missing poster pop-up at the community board. (This board is in the middle of our city). 

When you selected the poster you are ready to go and catch yourself some cats and hopefully it is the one missing! But be careful! If you do not sneak towards the cat it will flee from you! You need to get in close enough to swing you're net but not too close. 

Should you succeed you need to confirm if that cat is the one you were looking for. You'll be rewarded with money that you may spend in the shop for helpful items and clothing!
